message.body: Hey! Random question, do you happen to have a Turning Technologies Clicker? I need it for my Chem class so I'd figure I'd ask.
Um. I may have thrown it away but let me look today and I'll get back to you. I got Michael actually watching the hobbitt with me right now. Haha.
Awesome!!! And thank you! Mike and I are going to see it tonight.
I have the clicker. I'll give it to you the next time I see you.
Oh awesome! Thank you! I'll give you money for it! Just let me know how much.
Oh no don't worry about it. I think I got it used. I have no idea how much it was. It's yours.
Happy New Year! Sorry I didn't text last night. I was in bed. But I actually just woke up. I got into work this morning and they cancelled me!
Oh how ahhhhhhmazing!!! That must've been the nicest feeling ever!
Happy new year to you too!!!!!
Ugh. It was annoying though. I could have avoided getting up and ready if they only had my phone number on file. They wanted to cancel me at five. But yeah. I'm happy to be home.
What kind of workplace doesn't have a phone number on file for their employee?
Wow. That is very strange!!!! I hope they have it now. That is annoying, but happy to be home! Haha.
Thank you!!! And you enjoy the day with Michael!
